Start: ^I head to my door, nervously thumbing the key I took from Max's key ring days ago.

First: ^I don't know why Timothy locked himself in, but I am certain that it's the reason behind his future breakdown.
^And maybe if I can help stop that...
^I can finally escape this dream and leave this place.
Again: ^That damn letter is the root of so much pain.

b: ^I will help him as many times as he needs...
^I wasn't able to help you last time...

Enter: ^I slide the key into the lock and the door swings open.
^I step inside, gently nudging the door closed behind me.
^Timothy is curled up on his bed

ClosedWound: ^You follow Timothy, who heads back to your bedroom
^He's curled up on his bed, the letter he got, opened up on his room

b: ^should you try to comfort him, or go get someone more capable?

PoorStitches: ^You do not feel comfortable handling this on your own. best to get Max. Their at least paid for this.
